Sentencas: Single-phase lanthanum and niobium co-doped strontium titanate (Sr1-3x/2LaxTi0.9Nb0.1O3; x = 0-0.02) ceramics were prepared.
Titulo: Sintering and Electrical Characterization of La and Nb Co-doped SrTiO3 Electrode Materials for Solid Oxide Cell Applications

Sentencas: Dilatometry in reducing atmosphere showed an increaser in the sintering rate and sintered density with an increase in La amount.
Titulo: Sintering and Electrical Characterization of La and Nb Co-doped SrTiO3 Electrode Materials for Solid Oxide Cell Applications

Sentencas: Microscopy of fractured surfaces of sintered samples showed that the average grain size increased drastically in reducing conditions with increasing La content (and associated A-site vacancies).
Titulo: Sintering and Electrical Characterization of La and Nb Co-doped SrTiO3 Electrode Materials for Solid Oxide Cell Applications

Sentencas: By incorporating 2 mol.% La, the electronic conductivity significantly improved from 80 to 135 S cm(-1) at 1,000 degrees C, and even larger improvements were observed at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Sintering and Electrical Characterization of La and Nb Co-doped SrTiO3 Electrode Materials for Solid Oxide Cell Applications

Sentencas: These observations demonstrate the flexibility in tailoring the microstructure and electronic transport properties by doping small amounts of La into the Nb-doped SrTiO3 and show that Sr1-3x/2LaxTi0.9Nb0.1O3 is a potential electrode material for solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Sintering and Electrical Characterization of La and Nb Co-doped SrTiO3 Electrode Materials for Solid Oxide Cell Applications
